duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform installation, support, and ongoing technical service in the field for various types of Electronic Gaming Machines (slot machines) and related products.
Complete installations and visitation schedules as assigned by the Operations Manager or Supervisor.
Provide customer support for parts purchasing advice and technical challenges through CRM and mobile apps.
Review pre-install documents to determine parts needed for installation.
Maintain confidentiality of company and product information.
Maintain proper grooming and uniform/dress code.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required; experience in an industrial environment preferred.
